name: Top Truck Pack 1
description:
The first Pack of TOP TRUCK for FREE!

Ever dreamed of crushing cars in a bad boy monster truck? Now you can in Top Truck! Race the world in up to 16 awesome vehicles. Send the crowd to fever pitch as you crush cars, destroy terrain & grab bonus points! Search for hidden routes within the levels to finish in style, and enjoy some barnstorming loop-the-loops!

---------------
FEATURES
---------------
o Race through the ARENA

o 16 different trucks available to purchase, grouped together in 2 handy packs! Drive everything from the SharkShredder to the Enigma Mechanism (Jinkies!)

o Countless crazy, kooky and kickass levels!

o Massive levels means there is room for loads of different hidden paths. Can you find them all?

o Check out our very own CROWDOMETER to measure just how HYPED or booored the crowd is. Keep CRUSHING CARS to keep them wowed!

o Full ACCELEROMETER and SLIDER control.


Please report any bugs you find to business@aceviral.com The quicker you tell us, the quicker we can fix them.
